redFlagRules.label: Severe chest discomfort >= 10 minutes
redFlagRules.description: Current severe chest discomfort lasting at least 10 minutes.

redFlagRules.label: Chest discomfort + shortness of breath at rest
redFlagRules.description: Chest discomfort with concurrent shortness of breath at rest.

redFlagRules.label: Chest discomfort + fainting/near-fainting
redFlagRules.description: Chest discomfort with syncope or near-syncope.

redFlagRules.label: Chest discomfort + cold sweat + nausea/vomiting
redFlagRules.description: Cluster of symptoms suggestive of acute high-risk event.

redFlagRules.label: New neurologic signs
redFlagRules.description: Confusion, speech difficulty, or unilateral weakness/facial droop.

redFlagRules.label: Rapid worsening during session
redFlagRules.description: Symptoms rapidly worsen while completing triage.

redFlagRules.label: Life-threatening self-assessment
redFlagRules.description: User reports symptoms feel life-threatening right now.

confidencePolicy.high: All critical inputs present and no contradictions.
confidencePolicy.medium: One critical input missing or minor contradiction.
confidencePolicy.low: Two or more critical inputs missing, major contradiction, or user uncertainty on key items.
